title: Whats everyone doing for Valentines?
body:
Im taking someone out to a restaurant.
then I will probably sort some things out XD

Plan on releasing a Indie game a day soon, and figuring out how to move on with the bronze series.

Also, for anyone that reads this far, can someone try and test something out for me.
 If you have LoLreply, can you record a game and send it through my youtube emailing system.
I wanna see if I can get that game and then view it.

K thank you.
Have fun, good luck with yo love live.

replies.body: Spending it with your one true love, I approve XD
My bf just gifted me the new release sweetheart skins ♥ Probably going to watch deadpool later on, as our internet is crappy and we can't play league together
You should have spec't into some armor or more health.
Ahh yes, I forgot that was in the stats that I could increase, forgive me sir.
I'm waiting to RITO to flipping re-release the sweetheart tibbers icon again..... I waited a whole year again just to get it :c

yeah I hope so too, I dint get it the first time.
Maybe try sending them a ticket asking nicely?
